titleStmt.title: Whereas the Queenes Maiestie doth vnderstand, that notwithstanding her late proclamation concerning such persons as wander abroad in the habite of souldiers, there are diuers persons pretending to haue serued in the late warres and seruice as souldiers ...
Proclamations. 1592-02-28
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
